title: Chandrika Nakshi Haaram - Diamond & Ruby Adorned Gold Necklace
features: This exquisite necklace features a contemporary Haaram design, blending traditional aesthetics with modern elegance. The gold framework is intricately crafted with delicate curves and adorned with a dazzling array of brilliant-cut diamonds and vibrant round-cut rubies. Dangling pearls add a touch of classic charm. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the luster and depth of the gold.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
and sophisticated evening events. Also suitable as a statement piece for modern gatherings.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design, this Haaram showcases exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting brilliance. The use of diamonds and rubies adds a touch of luxury and auspiciousness, making it a cherished heirloom piece.
